intro: Filetia africana, commonly known as African filetia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and opposite, lance-shaped leaves. It produces small, fragrant white flowers that are clustered in umbels. The fruit is a small, spherical berry that turns from green to red as it matures.
